Package importedImplementations.NGA_MGRS.mgrs.mil.nga.sf.util.centroid

Class CentroidSurface

java.lang.Object
importedImplementations.NGA_MGRS.mgrs.mil.nga.sf.util.centroid.CentroidSurface
public class CentroidSurface extends Object
Calculate the centroid from surface based geometries. Implementation based on the JTS (Java Topology Suite) CentroidArea.
Since:
1.0.3
Author:
osbornb
